data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 139 believers in Niutao against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Niutao, Tuvalu
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 139 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Niutao against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Over 1.15 percent of the people of Niutao are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Kulia Village
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Kulia Village, Niutao, Tuvalu.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Niutao, Tuvalu.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 139 believers find a person of peace today among the 461 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 139 believers in Niutao against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
